about_the_game:
Choose your Hibow hero and be the last one standing on the future bow fight battlefield!

Features:

Realistic arrow fight in the air

The ultra-smooth VR arrow simulation guaranteed by development over 3 years, together with the muscle memory flight movement system, will give you a unique VR experience like no other.

Battle of wits

Choose your hero and use different skill and trait combinations for different battle situations.

The fast-paced gameplay with silky smooth flight movements allows you to react quickly and take the right strategic option, giving you complete control in every dogfight.

Diverse weapon and gear upgrade options

Choose from a wide selection of bows and arrows, including sniper bows and scattered, explosive and blinding arrows. Continue to upgrade your gear and gain an edge on the battlefield by your wisdom.

Diverse game modes with constant creative updates

Hibow never goes stale with a steady stream of new contents such as heroes, maps, game modes, weapons and seasonal leagues.

VR and Non-VR Players Compete Together

The game will release a non-VR version, allowing you to enter and experience a completely different combat encounter from firearm battles, regardless of whether you have VR headset or not!

After purchasing, you will get:

  • VIP Privileges

  • Short Bow Skin: "Prestige"

  • Tracker Skin:"Forces of Evil"

  • Heroes: Ninja, Guardian, Engineer

  • 10k Gold

Need Help?

contact us through Discord, mail, or simply leave comment, wheather for support or feedback, we are always happy to answer.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-10100/AMD Ryzen 3 3100 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970/AMD Radeon R9 290 (equivalent or better)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Standing Only
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-12400/AMD Ryzen 5 5600 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060/AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT (equivalent or better)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Standing Only

reviews:
“honestly with no exageration indented, by far the best game on this platorm for its genre hands down masterpiece 10/10 recommend. This migbt as well be the full game”
5 – Giovanni Sizino

“Incredibly fun game. Shooting myself around the training/menu area and raining arrows on target dummies feel amazing and then jumping into a game against real people takes it to a new level. It can be intense and my aim is awful so most kills come from melee but I am absolutely loving this game!! I experienced no VR discomfort while playing with joystick turning disabled and I experience it a lot in other fast-paced games.”
5 – Joey Thompson

“I am not that good at games, too many fiddly buttons to press and master on most of them for my comprehension. Hibrow however is super easy to master, and is tremendous fun. It's not that often that I can say that I have finished a session on a game with such a degree of satisfaction. Top marks to the dev, for making me good at something.”
5 – Michael Hunter
